user_stories.title: EPIC: Adaptive Intake Orchestration
user_stories.description: Coordinate every incoming idea, issue, and request so AI PM can triage and route them intelligently.
user_stories.i_want: see intake signals normalized and enriched automatically
user_stories.so_that: prioritization and planning stay aligned to strategic goals

user_stories.title: EPIC 1.1: Multi-channel capture services
user_stories.description: Provide connectors for chat, email, portal, and API submissions.
user_stories.so_that: nothing important is lost in translation

user_stories.title: Story 1.1.1: Chatbot transcript ingestion
user_stories.description: Stream chat transcripts into intake queues with metadata enrichment.
user_stories.i_want: review AI summaries of support chats
user_stories.so_that: common issues can be spotted quickly

user_stories.title: Story 1.1.2: Email parsing and dedupe
user_stories.description: Parse structured templates and deduplicate duplicates across domains.

user_stories.title: Story 1.1.1.1: Transcript redaction service
user_stories.description: Mask personal data from chat transcripts before storage.
user_stories.i_want: remove personal data from intake payloads

user_stories.title: Story 1.1.1.2: Meeting note summarizer
user_stories.description: Ingest meeting notes and produce concise action summaries.

user_stories.title: Story 1.1.2.1: Domain alias harmonizer
user_stories.description: Map sender aliases to a canonical account record.

user_stories.title: Story 1.1.2.2: Auto-response classifier
user_stories.description: Detect auto-responder emails and flag them for lightweight triage.

user_stories.title: Story 1.1.1.1.1: Redaction QA harness
user_stories.description: Generate synthetic transcripts to verify redaction rules.

user_stories.title: Story 1.1.1.1.2: Compliance evidence exporter
user_stories.description: Bundle redaction audit logs for monthly compliance reviews.

user_stories.title: Story 1.1.1.2.1: Voice meeting transcription
user_stories.description: Transcribe recorded meetings before summarization.

user_stories.title: Story 1.1.1.2.2: Action item extractor
user_stories.description: Convert meeting summaries into actionable backlog entries.

user_stories.title: Story 1.1.2.1.1: Alias merge review UI
user_stories.description: Provide analysts a view to approve alias merges.

user_stories.title: Story 1.1.2.2.1: Auto-response policy engine
user_stories.description: Configure routing policies for automated responses.

user_stories.title: Story 1.1.1.2.2.1: Meeting outcomes digest
user_stories.description: Publish weekly digest of meeting action completion.

user_stories.title: Story 1.1.1.2.1.1: Language pack expansion
user_stories.description: Add Spanish and Japanese transcription support.

user_stories.title: EPIC: Intelligent Planning Cadence
user_stories.description: Drive roadmap alignment through AI-assisted planning and prioritization.
user_stories.so_that: every squad focuses on high impact work

user_stories.title: EPIC 2.1: Scenario planning workspace
user_stories.description: Collaborative environment for modeling initiative scenarios.

user_stories.title: EPIC 2.2: Forecast accuracy models
user_stories.description: Predict capacity, velocity, and delivery confidence.

user_stories.title: Story 2.1.1: Scenario timeline visualizer
user_stories.description: Render Gantt-style roadmap views for each scenario.

user_stories.title: Story 2.1.2: Scenario comment threads
user_stories.description: Allow asynchronous discussion on each scenario assumption.

user_stories.title: Story 2.2.1: Velocity trend analyzer
user_stories.description: Aggregate sprint velocity and detect anomalies.

user_stories.title: Story 2.2.2: Capacity risk scoring
user_stories.description: Score initiatives based on staffing and risk buffers.

user_stories.title: Story 2.1.1.1: Portfolio lane configuration
user_stories.description: Allow admins to define portfolio swimlanes per scenario.

user_stories.title: Story 2.1.1.2: Scenario export to slides
user_stories.description: Export scenario summaries to presentation templates.

user_stories.title: Story 2.1.2.1: Annotation insights
user_stories.description: Summarize discussion themes across scenarios.

user_stories.title: Story 2.1.2.2: Governance notification rules
user_stories.description: Notify governance board when scenario comments stall.

user_stories.title: Story 2.2.1.1: Velocity anomaly alerts
user_stories.description: Send alerts when velocity drops below control limits.

user_stories.title: Story 2.2.2.1: Scenario capacity simulator
user_stories.description: Run Monte Carlo simulations on staffing scenarios.

user_stories.title: Story 2.1.1.2.1: Slide template theming
user_stories.description: Match exports to corporate branding automatically.

user_stories.title: Story 2.1.2.1.1: Sentiment scoring for comments
user_stories.description: Score scenario comments for sentiment swings.

user_stories.title: Story 2.1.2.2.1: Escalation workflow integration
user_stories.description: Connect stalled comment alerts to the escalation workflow.

user_stories.title: Story 2.1.1.1.1: Scenario API
user_stories.description: Expose scenario configurations via API for partners.

user_stories.title: EPIC: Delivery Insight Loop
user_stories.description: Close the loop from execution to learning with predictive insights.
user_stories.i_want: understand outcomes and risks in real time

user_stories.title: EPIC 3.1: Execution telemetry mesh
user_stories.description: Unify work item, deployment, and incident telemetry.

user_stories.title: EPIC 3.2: Predictive outcome modeling
user_stories.description: Forecast delivery outcomes and customer impact.

user_stories.title: Story 3.1.1: Deployment telemetry adapters
user_stories.description: Integrate CI/CD tools into the telemetry mesh.

user_stories.title: Story 3.1.2: Incident correlation engine
user_stories.description: Correlate incidents with deployments and backlog items.

user_stories.title: Story 3.2.1: Outcome feature store
user_stories.description: Centralize features for predictive outcome models.

user_stories.title: Story 3.2.2: Customer sentiment ingestion
user_stories.description: Blend NPS and feedback scores into outcome models.

user_stories.title: Story 3.1.1.1: Release readiness dashboard
user_stories.description: Surface deployment readiness metrics across pipelines.

user_stories.title: Story 3.1.1.2: Deployment anomaly alerts
user_stories.description: Alert on deployment failure rates above baseline.

user_stories.title: Story 3.1.2.1: Incident root cause clustering
user_stories.description: Cluster incident narratives for trend analysis.

user_stories.title: Story 3.2.1.1: Feature freshness monitor
user_stories.description: Monitor feature data drift and refresh cadence.

user_stories.title: Story 3.2.2.1: Sentiment survey harmonizer
user_stories.description: Normalize surveys from multiple regions.

user_stories.title: Story 3.1.1.1.1: Release guardrail policies
user_stories.description: Define guardrail thresholds per service tier.

user_stories.title: Story 3.1.1.2.1: Cross-pipeline alert routing
user_stories.description: Route deployment alerts to the right on-call teams.

user_stories.title: Story 3.1.2.1.1: Incident narrative tagging
user_stories.description: Apply taxonomy tags to incident summaries.

user_stories.title: Story 3.2.2.1.1: Regional sentiment calibration
user_stories.description: Calibrate sentiment baselines per locale.

user_stories.title: Story 3.1.1.1.1.1: Guardrail audit dashboard
user_stories.description: Visualize guardrail breaches and overrides.
